briefTitle: Case Control Study to Identify Modifiable Risk Factors for Colorectal and Breast Cancer in Nigeria
officialTitle: Case Control Study to Identify Modifiable Risk Factors for Colorectal and Breast Cancer in Nigeria
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Development and Validation of Questionnaire For Assessing Modifiable Risk Factors for Cancer in Sub-Saharan Africa
eligibilityCriteria:
Case Group - Patients must have histologically confirmed diagnosis of colorectal or breast cancer.

Control Group - Patients must not have a diagnosis of cancer.
